bibl.title: Dionysiaca. Nine Studies in Greek Poetry Presented to Sir Denys Page
bibl.note: Contient une réédition commentée de P. Oxy. XXXII, 2623, fr. 21 (a) + fr. 22. L'ode serait de Simonide.
bibl.seg: Barrett W.S., The Oligaithidai and their Victories (Pindar, Olympian 13; SLG 339, 340).
Dionysiaca. Nine Studies in Greek Poetry Presented to Sir Denys Page (Cambridge, 1978) pp. 1-20.
